content: {"name": "Visitation of the Blessed Virgin Mary Roman Catholic Church", "alternate_name": "", "description": null, "email": "", "url": "http://visitationbvm-brooklyn.org/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "98 Richards St", "address_2": null, "city": "New York", "state_province": "NY", "postal_code": "11231", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 40.678878, "longitude": -74.0089394}, "phones": [{"number": "(718) 624-1572", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "15:00", "closes_at": "17:00"}, {"weekday": "Saturday", "opens_at": "15:00", "closes_at": "17:00"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "16:30", "closes_at": "17:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Must bring own bags/cart"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Grab and Go Meals"}]}
